data.title: pycrires: pipeline for processing high-resolution spectroscopy data from CRIRES+
data.name: pycrires

evidence: "*pycrires* is a Python wrapper for running the CRIRES+ recipes of *EsoRex*. The pipeline organizes the raw data, creates SOF and configuration files... runs the calibration and science recipes, improves the wavelength solution, and creates plots of the images and extracted spectra."
"Data reduction pipeline for VLT/CRIRES+" (indicates a domain-specific scientific data reduction application used directly in research workflows).

PyPI badges and links: ".. |PyPI Status| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pycrires :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pycrires" and ".. |Python Versions| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/pycrires :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pycrires" (indicating distribution via the PyPI package registry).
